data.text:
All the Loving Couples Credits Title: All the Loving Couples Genres: Drama Directed by: Mack Bing Written by: Leo Gordon Produced by: Harold Nebenzal; Bill Schwartz; Milo O. Frank, Jr. Music by: Casanova Cinematography: Brick Marquard Edited by: Larry Heath Production Distributed by: Cottage Films

Hemdale Film Corporation Released: March 19th, 1969 Rating: X Running time: 85 min. Country: USA Language: English Navigation Previous: — Next: —

All the Loving Couples is an American independent film of the drama genre. It was directed by Mack Bing with a screenplay written by Leo Gordon base off of Gordon's novel of the same name. It was produced by Cottage Films and distributed in the United Kingdom through the Hemdale Film Corporation. The film premiered on March 19th, 1969.
